articles.description: Frax sFRAX Live Frax Finance launches sFRAX. Users are able to stake their FRAX and earn Tbill yield on it, similar to $DAI's DSR. Yield is at ~10%. articles.description: MEV Protocol Live Manifold launches MEV Protocol on Ethereum. The protocol's MEV auction system permits multiple winners per auction slot. MEV protocol will integrate mevETH, an LST launched by Manifold. Armada Live on Solana Token liquidity management protocol Armada is live on Solana.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - MEV Protocol Live, Token Liquidity Management on Solana, Quest to Earn, and more...

articles.description: Native BTC Coming to Cosmos nBTC, an IBC-compatible token issued by the Nomic chain, will launch on Osmosis. nBTC will allow users to bring their BTC into Cosmos without converting it into another cryptocurrency. TProtocol USTP RWA project TProtocol launches USTP, a stablecoin backed by US treasury yield. USTP has three types that meet the different needs of investors: rUSTP, iUSTP, and Standard USTP.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Native BTC Coming to Cosmos, Stablecoin Backed by Treasuries, Automated Uni V3 LPing, and more...

Bitcoin Spot ETFs incoming? articles.title: Today in DeFi - Grayscale Files ETH Spot ETF, Bitcoin Spot ETFs Incoming?, Leverage BTC On chain, and more...

articles.description: GammaSwap Live GammaSwap is live on Arbitrum mainnet. Gamma is a DEX on top of Uniswap v2, allowing users to trade volatility through AMMs (i.e. short LP tokens). Traders can use Gamma to speculate on volatility or as "insurance" for their spot holdings, and MMs can use Gamma to hedge their LP position.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - GammaSwap Live, Poolshark Limit Pools, Higher Savings Rate, and More...

articles.description: Balancer Frontend Attack Balancer frontend is under a DNS attack. Users are advised to not interact with the UI while the issue is under investigation. Approved: Gro to Unwind The Gro community voted to wind down the protocol and DAO due to the leadership vacuum and existential uncertainty.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Balancer Frontend Attack, RWA Partnership: Centrifuge x Aave, Diversified LST Yield, and More...

articles.description: Yearn yETH Live Yearn launches yETH, a yield-bearing token comprising five LSTs, including sfrxETH, swETH, wstETH, ETHx, and cbETH. Raft V2 Interest Rate Vaults Live LST-backed stablecoin protocol Raft launches V2 Interest Rate Vaults, allowing users to mint the R stablecoin with LSTs as collateral ( $wstETH, $rETH, $cbETH, $swETH, and $WETH). R now offers a 6%-8% APR.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - Yearn yETH Live, Raft V2 Interest Rate Vaults, Best Metamask Snaps, and More...

articles.description: opBNB Mainnet Live opBNB mainnet is now open to the public. opBNB is an EVM-compatible L2 built on the Optimism OP Stack. There are now over 150 projects building on opBnB. Comsos V12 Live Cosmos has completed the ‚ÄúGaia V12‚Äù upgrade. The upgrade introduces the liquid staking module (LSM), allowing for ATOM staked with validators to convert into liquid-staked ATOM.
articles.title: Today in DeFi - opBNB Mainnet Live, Cosmos V12 Live, Cross-chain Farming, and More...
